resources.string: There are no email apps installed on your device…
If you enjoy playing %s, please take a moment to rate it.\n\nThanks for your support\u00A0!

Game and Music by Guillaume Gouchon.

Metal Music by Outsider, listen here.

You can suggest your own quests on the Facebook Page.
Feel free to contact me if you have any issue or question.

The game uses AndEngine game engine by Nicolas Gramlich.
Game icons by game-icons.net.
Background art by Q_x.
Launcher icon by Sonia Lahcene.
Dungeon tileset by Daniel Cook.
It is recommended to do the tutorial in order to know how to play\u00A0!\nWould you like to do it now\u00A0?

Congratulations !

You have finished the game with all the characters !

The village of Gundin is now safe and your name will be reminded for decades there.
See you at the next episode for new epic adventures, and thanks for playing %s !
Hey adventurer, welcome to the Easy Dungeon shop\u00A0!\n\nHere are today\'s offers.
Hey adventurer, welcome to the Easy Dungeon shop\u00A0! Here are today\'s offers.
Are you sure you want to %1$s %2$s\u00A0?
Strength : used to deal damages, equip heavy items
Dexterity : used to dodge, react, aim
Spirit : used to react, focus, gain skills
Are you sure you want to leave this quest\u00A0?\n\n(you will come back to the adventure screen)
Are you sure you want to finish this quest and leave the dungeon\u00A0?
Are you sure you want to leave this floor and go deeper into the dungeon\u00A0?
Your bag is full, the %s has been dropped on the ground
Both hands are needed to use this item
I don\'t want to talk to you anymore.
You are the Berserker, a fearless tribal warrior fighting his foes with rage and fury.
You are the Dwarf Warrior, a tough close-combat fighter but weak against magic.
You are the Elf Ranger, a versatile adventurer with range attack skills as well as magical abilities.
You are the Wizard, a great sorcerer specialized in offensive spells. Be sure to keep your distance during fights though.
You are the Thief, a silent but deadly adventurer who can hide herself from her enemies.
You are the Druid, a strong spell caster who uses her knowledge of natural energies to defeat her foes.
Boosts up your strength for a small amount of time.
Once drunk, this potion makes you feel heroic. You can play twice in a row.
This grey liquid turns you invisible for a small amount of time.
You are feeling lucky; it is easier for you to avoid attacks.
If you drink this mixture, an invisible magic shield will appear around you and will protect you for a small amount of time.
This sparkling potion will make you feel light as a feather, increasing your movement for a small amount of time.
This ring makes the wearer look blurry, dodging attacks more easily.
A shield of fire surrounds the wearer.
The wearer detects more easily the weaknesses of its opponents.
The wearer sees its senses being stimulated.
The wearer feels far more powerful.
You become enraged : you are able to deal more damages but your defense is slightly decreased.
Inflicts heavy damages to all the creatures around you.
You cry out loudly to intimidate your opponents.
Increases greatly your chances of dealing critical hits.
You hide yourself under your cloak, becoming invisible to your enemies\' eyes.
You throw a poisonous dart on an enemy, dealing poisonous damages over time.
You avoid your opponents\' attacks as a leaf blowing in the wind.
You hit the ground vigorously, stunning and dealing damages to nearby enemies.
You study the art of parrying, increasing your chances to block an attack.
You drink a large amount of Dwarf Ale, healing your wounds but decreasing your reflexes for some time.
You shoot a frost arrow on an opponent, dealing damages and slowing him down drastically.
You use your natural charm to disturb an enemy\'s mind.
You invoke a rain of blazing stars on your enemies.
Paralysing plants suddenly grow around your enemies, stopping them and slowing them down.
You use your knowledge of natural things to heal your wounds with the vegetation around you.
You invoke the wolf spirit, boosting your chances of dealing critical hits and dodging attacks for a small amount of time.
You invoke the spirit of the Crow to curse your opponents, decreasing their attack and defense for some time.
You cast a fireball on your enemies, dealing damages and burning them over time.
You make one target sleep deeply.
You invoke a thunder storm on your opponents, dealing electrical damages to them.
Your skin becomes stone for some time, increasing your armor drastically.
You enters your enemies\'s mind and install terror in them, stunning your opponents and dealing damages to them over time.
A simple adventure in which you will learn how to move, fight, loot treasures and more…

string-array.name: tutorial_hints
string-array.item:
Welcome to the Tutorial ! You will learn here how to survive in deadly dungeons.

First, learn how to move: when you are not in combat mode, tap on any tile to move to it.

Tap on the door to move on to the next room.

There is a monster in this room, that means that the game is now turn-based.
In fight mode, the tiles you can reach for this turn are enlightened in green.

Finish your turn by tapping on your character.

This goblin looks angry, let\'s get rid of him.\n\nA red tile will appear under any monster which will be within your attack range. Tap on the monster to select it and then tap again to validate the attack.

Good work ! You have earned some gold and some experience points !
Tap on the top right-handed button to see your hero details and to check your experience level.

Then, move on to the next room.
Wow, there is a treasure chest here !\nSelect the treasure chest and then open it by tapping on it again.
Awesome you found a ring, let\'s equip it now. Tap on the bag button in the bottom right-hand corner to open your bag, then select the ring and equip it.

Perfect, you really look like a biker now !
Remember that there are 7 levels of items and that each level has its own color code.
Sometimes, you will find items which are not suitable to your type of character; they will be written in a red color and you will not be able to equip them…

Move on to the last room.

Be sure to remember these last points:
- If you are ever feeling lost, you can check the dungeon map with the button at the top of the screen.
- You will get skills in your next adventures; these are powerful but they can only be used once a dungeon floor, so keep them for the most dangerous places.

Reach the stairs now to finish the tutorial.

resources.string: You did not do what was expected !\n\nYou failed at the tutorial :) !

Finally, you decided to jump ahead; you set aside your boring life to become a rootless adventurer, looking for gold and glory through the three kingdoms.

On the road to the first tavern, you met an old man asking for help.
His daughter Lubrice has been kidnapped by an Orc Chief from the nearby mountains, and he is begging you to bring her back alive.

Looks like your first Quest begins !

Well done, your first quest is a success !

You left the caverns straight away and arrived at the nearest village in the evening.

After a few pints at the tavern, you had a well-deserved sleep.

Your thirst for adventures has to wait until the next day.
Wow, this guy seems hurt to death… let\'s talk to him.
Ah ah\u00A0! It\'s a good start\u00A0!
Let\'s find out where the Orc Chief is hiding and then save the girl\u00A0!
Hey adventurer, don\'t do the same mistakes as me…\n\nDo you want I tell you some tips\u00A0?

Experience is primordial : new levels will increase your health points, characteristics and will give you skill points to improve or to learn new skills.\n\nConcerning weapons, remember not to fight with range weapons in close combat, and try to use a shield with your second arm cause a weapon will deal less damage with this arm.
Aaargh, so it is time for me now…
Thanks for that… Take this Potion of Force to help you in your next fights… May the force be with you... Aaaaargh...
Die, you are so weak compared to me\u00A0!\n(finish him)
I will pray for you, mighty warrior.
Who are you\u00A0? Are you here to save me\u00A0?
Yes, your father sent me here to rescue you
No, I\'ll just steal your gold and leave\u00A0!
We are poor farmers, we don\'t have much to give you…
And this ring on your hand\u00A0?\n(point her green emerald ring)
Thanks brave adventurer, your name and your glorious acts will be renowned in all the kingdom\u00A0!
No problem my lady, let\'s leave this place now\u00A0!
Pleeeaaaaase\u00A0! Don\'t leave me with these creatures\u00A0!
You are not that rich but your gold will be well spent at the tavern; have a good stay\u00A0!
I prefer a troll than you, a sweaty stinky adventurer\u00A0!\n(she slaps you)
Ouch… damn, I should take a bath
It was a gift from my beloved mother… before she got run over by a herd of savage pigs…
Such a nice ending\u00A0! Ok, let\'s leave this place now

A group of bandits known as Sons of Vanark is terrorizing the village of Gundin. Led by Vanark, a mighty chaos warrior, they regularly attack and rob the villagers, riding some tall and noisy horses.

Gundin's mayor is offering you 250 gold coins if you manage to put them out of harm.

After a few hours of walking through the nearby forests, you finally find the entrance of their lair, ready to stop their dreadful wrongdoing.
The town of Gundin is now safe thanks to you\u00A0!\n\nThe mayor gave you the 250 gold coins at your return, advising you to not spend everything at the tavern\u00A0!
A Dark Elven poisonous black blade.
I am here for business. Where is your boss\u00A0?
Ah\u00A0? Alright so you must be able to tell me which village is our next target\u00A0?
Ahah, such a bad liar\u00A0! Prepare to die\u00A0!
Good, take that and bring it to Vanark. He is waiting for you downstairs.
Damn, who forgot again to close this entrance door\u00A0? …
You again\u00A0? You\'re pissing me off.
A silver ring with a skull and the letters SOV on it.
A one-handed long sword enlightened in blue. When you take it, your hairs are getting dishevelled. Deals some damages overtime.
I am missing the tavern…\nLet\'s finish this quest quickly\u00A0!
Nothing can stop me\u00A0!\nLet\'s head back to Gundin.
Who dares disturbing the rest of Vanark the Great\u00A0? Get you ass ready to be kicked\u00A0!

Last night at the tavern, you were as usual playing dice and losing all your gold when one of your opponents proposed you a deal to get back what was yours (including your sword and your horse… yes, you lost a lot that night !).

'All you have to do is to get rid of a monster living in a cave not far from here' did he tell you, an easy task for you !
The problem is that you accepted the deal before the bar tenant warns you that the monster was a mighty Balrog…
Happy to be still alive, you went back to Gundin and celebrated your victory over evil (and what a victory) at the tavern. Will you play dice again\u00A0?

What is greater than God,
more evil than the devil,
the poor have it,
the rich need it,
and if you eat it, you'll die ?
Feed me and I live, yet give me a drink and I die.\n\nWho am I\u00A0?

If you have me, you want to share me.
If you share me, you haven't got me.

What am I ?
You are wrong my friend… Farewell
Good answer. I have no more riddle to ask you…
It appears that you have answered right to all my riddles. Take this as a reward. I hope this item will help you during your next adventures.
A mithril armor forged by the dwarves a few centuries ago. It is light and very protective.
Do I really have to accomplish this quest\u00A0?\nBalrogs are for adventurers which are at least level 200\u00A0!
Such a strange White Wizard, I am sure I have already seen him somewhere…
I can smell the Balrog\'s magic from there…
Ok, let\'s tell everyone that I defeated a real Balrog… Maybe should I fake some scares on my face\u00A0?

Waaaaaaaaaagh !

What ? What did you expect ? The developer did not have the budget for a Balrog sprite… you know what it is, indie gaming… 

I am Balrog the goblin, what can I do for you ?
I heard that goblins know how to play tavern games…
You\'re right\u00A0! I am the best dice player of all the area, that\'s why tavern people hate me\u00A0!\n\nI hope you were not sent there by some angry losers to kill me, were you\u00A0?
No, no… I was visiting your lair
Yes, and I\'ll stop you from winning everyone\'s gold just for fun\u00A0! You\'re a monster\u00A0!
Alright, then what do you want from me\u00A0?
Teach me how to play dice the correct way
(Balrog the goblin taught you how to play dice)\n\nGood, say hello to all my friends from Gundin for me\u00A0! See you.
(after a few games and after having lost half of your gold)
but… you are cheating\u00A0! You\'ll pay for this\u00A0!
I hate adventurers… Why are they so aggressive\u00A0?
The Quest of the Strange Old Man

As you are finishing your pint and hailing the innkeeper for the next one, a strange old man wearing a long black cloak is sitting at your table.

After some talking, it appears that he is Xsar, the famous wizard, and that he is looking for some special ingredients, a rare species of mushrooms, in order to brew a potion.

After pointing out on your map the location, he proposes you 200 gold coins for this simple quest.
A strange place to find some mushrooms…
There must be rare species of mushrooms in this cave. Everyone seems to be looking for them.
Why do I only meet insane people in this village\u00A0?
This dagger is soaked with a powerful poison.
Another adventurer here\u00A0? This is MY quest\u00A0!
Ahah\u00A0! You really thought I was not violent and crazy\u00A0?
Good evening adventurer\u00A0!\nIn fact, I was not looking for mushrooms as my special recipe; YOU will be my special recipe\u00A0!
Reminder for myself : avoid this kind of mushrooms…

You were just arriving at the inn when a tavern fight occurred. Not this time, you told to yourself, and you headed directly to the bar.

Suddenly a man rushed at you but you managed to get him on the ground.
'Damn, you are the kind of person I need ! Nice to meet you, I am Link', he told you.
He then convinced you, in exchange of some ales, to follow him into the dungeon of the Lord of Doom, a powerful undead creature.

You finally agreed on a 50–50 deal on the loot and started the adventure…
It is just the start of the quest, and Link has already gone solo… Let\'s find him\u00A0!
Next time I\'ll do it on my own, I have done the most part of the job\u00A0!
Come help me\u00A0! I am out-numbered\u00A0!
Sorry I have already emptied this treasure chest\u00A0! You\'ll take the next one (if any…)
It was a cool Quest, no\u00A0? Did you enjoy it\u00A0?
Ok then, see you at the tavern\u00A0!
You should have shared the loot\u00A0!
Free me and I give you a kiss\u00A0!

(the princess gives you a kiss)

It is always working with adventurers !
No need to propose them gold.
Oh… you are far more clever than the other guy who keeps saving me usually…\n\nYou are right, nothing is free in this world, here is your gold.
The poor Princess trick cannot work all the time\u00A0! Please stay safe for once.
I have none of this\u00A0! Charge\u00A0!
It is not good for the breath…

You are awakening in a jail surrounded of glass.

A few seconds later, you are in a dungeon which looks familiar to you…

Then, people you may know arrive silently around you and disappear… What is it all about ?

You finally awaken at the table of the inn, your half empty glass of beer waiting for you.

It was just a dream, yes, only a strange dream…

Lastly, you take the decision not to drink this type of Ale anymore !
I must escape this dream.\nI can feel something strange in it… maybe magic.
You are the first one to go this deep into his own nightmare.\n\nDo you really think you can beat me while are you asleep\u00A0?
Be gone from my mind, evil wizard\u00A0!
